articles.title: Frank Hester: Rishi Sunak say he won't return money from donor accused of racism - BBC.com
articles.description: The PM says Frank Hester's alleged comments about Diane Abbott were "racist" but his "remorse" should be accepted.

articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Nothing Phone (2a) Exclusive: iPhone Challenger Breaks Record On First Day - Forbes
articles.description: Well, that was quick. The new phone from Nothing has just gone on sale and it has hit its first milestone much faster than previous phones.
articles.content: Nothing, the London-based tech company, has just released its third cellphone, the Nothing Phone (2a). It went on sale on Tuesday, March 12, and in just a matter of hours it has hit its first landmar… [+2459 chars]
